Articles.Content: So i saw a video about changing the ksp graphics with this mod. Slight problem. I am dumb and new at the game so i would like some instructions i can understand.

To install Parallax it is best that you use CKAN module manager to do so. 

It will install the following; 

  • Parallax 2.0.6  -- This is the main program and will be placed it in your GameData folder as the Parallax directory
  • Parallax - Stock Planet Textures 2.0.0  -- These are graphics needed to change the look of the stock planets and will be placed it in your GameData folder as the Parallax_StockTextures directory
  • Parallax - Stock Scatter Textures 2.0.1 -- These are graphics to replace the stock scatter (rocks, trees, etc)   and will be placed it in your GameData/Parallax_StockTextures folder as the _Scatters directory
  • If you don not already have the following mods installed they will be installed as dependencies. All are installed in GameData
    • Kopernicus Planetary System Modifier -- required for Parallax.
    • ModuleManager -- required for Kopernicus.
    • Harmony2 -- required for Kopernicus.
    • ModularFlightIntegrator -- Required for Kopernicus .

If you do not use CKAN, then you will have to locate each required mod and manually install them in the correct locations. 

You will also need to change you game graphics Terrain Shader to the Ultra setting. If this is not done, you will receive a warning on game load.  These settings are accessed from the main menu of the game.

Thanks Man! I got CKAN but it opens up some sort of console and a thing that opens my files. What do i do next??? Edit: I got it all working and done. Thank  you!

 

Edited January 15, 2023 by ABLANKw0rld
I got it!
